subject: 2013 Hawija clashes
object: Initial clashes in Hawija, Kirkuk Governorate, later spread to central and northern Iraq

subject: 2013 Hawija clashes
object: Insurgents briefly take over the town of Suleiman Bek on 25 April, Army imposes curfew in Diyala and Anbar Governorates, Iraqi government bans 10 TV stations (incl. Al Jazeera) from broadcasting on 29 April, Karameh Border Crossing temporarily closed on 30 April

subject: 2013 Hawija clashes
object: the Iraqi insurgency and the 2012-2013 Iraqi protests

subject: Belligerents
object: Naqshbandi Army, Intifada Ahrar al-Iraq, Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant, Iraq, Iraqi Government, Iraqi Army, Iraqi Police, Kurdistan Region, Peshmerga, Sahwa militia

subject: Commanders and leaders
object: Izzat Ibrahim ad-Douri, Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, Iraq, Nouri al-Maliki, Iraq, Babaker Shawkat B. Zebari, Kurdistan Region, Massoud Barzani, Iraq, Ahmad Abu Risha
